name: 2 a.m.
description:
it's 2 a.m. and you don't know what to do

the game contains some disturbing text. discretion is advised.

a game for Finally Finish Something 2019

game created by jem j. sarmiento / artsybarrels

music [to be added soon]

use arrow keys or WASD to walk and interact

this bitsy "game" is based on my bad experiences these past few months. hallucinations, insomnia, nightmares, and longing for things that you can't reach
